root.name: Devil May Cry HD Collection
root.description: OverviewThe Devil May Cry HD Collection is a compilation of the first three Devil May Cry games, remade in high definition, and released on the PS3 and Xbox 360 on April 3, 2012. The collection includes Devil May Cry, Devil May Cry 2, and the Special Edition version of Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening.Bonus FeaturesAll three games remastered in HDBonus Content (Concept Art, Fan Art, Music)Trophies and Achievements Support
